paragraphs.text:
%md

For the file **spark-intro.txt**, <font color="blue">**count the number of occurrences of each word [ignore word if it contains '.', '-' and ',']**</font>

msg.data: For the file spark-intro.txt, **count the number of occurrences of each word [ignore word if it contains ‘.’, ‘-’ and ‘,’]**

paragraphs.text:
%spark

val lines = sc.textFile("../../../../data/spark-intro.txt")

val wordMap = lines.flatMap(line => line.split(" ")).filter(w => (! w.contains(",")) && (! w.contains(".")) && (! w.contains("-")) ).map(w => (w,1))

val wordFreqMap = wordMap.reduceByKey((x,y) => (x + y))

wordFreqMap.collect.foreach(println)

paragraphs.text:
%md

For the file **spark-intro.txt**, <font color="blue">**print the top twenty words in decreasing order of their frequency**</font>

msg.data: For the file spark-intro.txt, **print the top twenty words in decreasing order of their frequency**

paragraphs.text:
%spark

val lines = sc.textFile("../data/spark-intro.txt")

val wordMap = lines.flatMap(line => line.split(" ")).filter(w => (! w.contains(",")) && (! w.contains(".")) && (! w.contains("-")) ).map(w => (w,1))

val wordFreqSorted = wordFreqMap.sortBy(_._2, false)

wordFreqSorted.take(20).foreach(println)
